metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1729 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in LibRaw. A heap-buffer-overflow in raw2image_ex() caused by a maliciously crafted file may lead to an application crash.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
